Classes/MoviesListViewModel.html#/s:22Mo.name: fetchMovies(pageNo:)
Classes/MoviesListViewModel.html#/s:22Mo.abstract: Call this function to fetch list of movies from server for a page and insert or append data. ie top or bottom also sets the observable values for subscribers and also checks for offline data incase of not connection.

Classes/MoviesListViewModel.html#/s:22Mo.name: shouldFetchDataAndShowLoaderForPageNo(_:)
Classes/MoviesListViewModel.html#/s:22Mo.abstract: Call this function to show the top, bottom or svprogress loader or return offline data incase of no internet and has offline data in realm or continue with server request incase of no offline data.

Classes/MoviesListViewModel.html#/s:22Mo.name: checkIfMoreRecordsExits(movieInterface:pageNo:)
Classes/MoviesListViewModel.html#/s:22Mo.abstract: Call this function to check that pageNo is not the last page or 1st page, returns true if more records can be fetched else shows snacbar and returns false.

Classes/MoviesListViewModel.html#/s:22Mo.name: checkIfOffline()
Classes/MoviesListViewModel.html#/s:22Mo.abstract: Check internet connectivity, returns movies from realm db if exists and no internet, else returns nil
